installer¶

tik_tracktor.installer¶

This module handles the installation and setup of the Tracktor system.

tik_tracktor.installer.copy_init_to_management(path: Path)¶

Copies the __init__ into TIK/manager folder

Parameters:

path (Path) – the root path to the TIK Manager installation (tik_manager4)

tik_tracktor.installer.copy_plugin_to_external(path: Path)¶

Copies tracktor_api.py to TIK/external folder

Parameters:

path (Path) – the root path to the TIK Manager installation (tik_manager4)

tik_tracktor.installer.copy_plugin_to_management(path: Path)¶

Copies the tracktor folder into TIK/manager folder

Parameters:

path (Path) – the root path to the TIK Manager installation (tik_manager4)

tik_tracktor.installer.get_tik_path()¶

Fetches the installation path for TIK manager. Default path is a windows installation at: C:Program FilesTikWorks ik_manager4 Alternatively the user is asked to input their path (if installed in different dir or on different OS).

Returns:

Path object of tik_manager4 dir.
